item.description:
Organizer: William
Contact: http://photo.meetup.c...
Target Audience: Members of NEPN & NEPE

Join other Photographers on Thatcher Island for the Annual Art and Photography Days. Photographers of all levels are invited to Photograph the Island. Thatcher Island Lies about a mile offshore of Rockport MA. We will head out to the Island on Saturday Morning August 11th and return later that Afternoon to Photograph Rockport at sunset.

There is a $25.00 dollar fee for the ferry to the Island. Beverages will be provided. Space for this trip is limited as the Ferry only takes 15 people.

The Thatcher Island Art Show will take place on August 23rd and last three days. There will be a reception in the evening of the 23rd. Please email me about how to participate in this show.

this is in conjuction with NEPE: http://photo.meetup.c...


*plz note that I have changed the time to get to the Ferry as it actually leaves at 9am...I am planning for getting there an hour early, also don't forget to pack a luch as Beverages will be provided

I will also be contacting Thatcher Island to confirm how many have already confirmed and ask if it's alright if some bring money on Saturday

any questions feel free to contact me as William has been pulled out of town for a bit

~Will
item.name: RSVP for Art and Photo day on Thatcher Island/ Rockport Sunset
